title: Poisoned
description: In this Dateline classic, the unexplained death of a beloved chiropractor becomes a criminal investigation when authorities discover she’d been poisoned. Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on December 1, 2017.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
